brand.name: Ski №1 Rental
brand.tagline: Premium ski & snowboard rental and private lessons in Bakuriani.

resort.name: Bakuriani
resort.description: Popular ski resort in Georgia in the Greater Caucasus Mountains, approximately 120–130 km from Tbilisi, on the Georgian Military Road. There are slopes for different levels — from beginner training to confident skiing, as well as large areas near the slopes for freeride enthusiasts. The resort is compact and convenient: accommodation, cafes and services are usually located near the lifts. In winter, road conditions can change due to weather, so it's better to plan your trip with extra time.

location.directions:
We are a professional ski and snowboard rental focused on quality equipment for comfort, safety, and great experiences on the slopes.

We help you choose the right gear for your level and style, ensuring a perfect fit from the first minutes. Our rental offers everything for adults and children — skis, snowboards, boots, bindings, kids' sets, as well as clothing and accessories for any weather.

Our goal is to make your winter holiday easy and enjoyable. Beginners get clear guidance and support, experienced riders get advanced equipment, and our professional instructors help you progress and ride with confidence at any level.

pageTitles.openMapDescription: Open the map in a new tab for navigation.
pageTitles.mapErrorDescription: A problem occurred while loading Google Maps on this page.
pageTitles.liftsSubtitle: 14 working lines of Doppelmayr (Austria) and Poma (France) cable way
pageTitles.rentalSubtitle: Professional gear for any skill level.
pageTitles.requestBookingSubtitle: Fill out the form to request equipment rental
pageTitles.lessonsSubtitle: Our team of professional instructors will help you master alpine skiing and snowboarding or improve your skills, regardless of your skill level. We work with children and adults, beginners and advanced riders.
pageTitles.lessonsIndividualText: Duration — {duration}. Each lesson is tailored to your goals and skill level. The instructor focuses only on you, allowing you to progress as quickly as possible and receive personalized recommendations.
pageTitles.lessonsGroupText: Available by prior arrangement. To clarify the schedule, group composition and cost, contact us by phone or through messengers.
pageTitles.lessonsGuarantee: All our instructors have international certificates and years of experience. We guarantee safety, a professional approach and individual attention to each student.
pageTitles.lessonsTeamSubtitle: Professionals with experience and passion for alpine skiing
pageTitles.servicesSubtitle: We keep your gear in top condition — fast, carefully and to service standards. We handle everything from routine maintenance to full repairs for skis, snowboards and related equipment. Our workshop can help with base repairs, P-tex filling, edge tuning and sharpening, stone grinding (where available), hot waxing, binding checks and adjustments, and general inspections to make sure your equipment is safe and feels great on snow.
pageTitles.servicesSubtitle2: Whether you need a quick refresh before the next run or a proper fix after hitting rocks, we'll restore performance, improve glide, and help your gear last longer — with clear recommendations and fair turnaround times.
pageTitles.footerDescription: Premium rentals & lessons in Bakuriani. Fast, fresh, friendly.
pageTitles.bookingFormNotesPlaceholder: e.g. shoe size 42, height 175cm, skill level...

pageTitles.bookingFormSubmitNote: This is a request, not an instant reservation. We'll confirm availability by email/phone.
pageTitles.bookingFormSuccessDesc: We've sent a confirmation email. We'll contact you soon to confirm availability.

items.title: Professional rental
items.text: High-quality ski and snowboard equipment for comfort and safety.

items.title: Right selection
items.text: We choose gear based on your level and riding style for a perfect fit.

items.title: For adults and kids
items.text: Complete sets for adults and children, including kids' equipment.

items.title: Clothing and accessories
items.text: Jackets, pants, helmets, goggles, and gloves for any weather.

items.title: All skill levels
items.text: From first-time riders to confident skiers and snowboarders.

items.title: Experienced instructors
items.text: Professional lessons to help you progress and ride with confidence.

items.title: Quality care
items.text: Friendly service, well-maintained gear, and a great experience on the slopes.

items.title: Certified instructors
items.text: Add your real certificates here (images or PDF links).

items.title: Serviced equipment
items.text: We tune and check gear regularly for safety and performance.

instructors.title: Our instructor team
instructors.subtitle: Professionals with experience and passion for alpine skiing

items.name: Nika
items.title: Certified instructor • 7+ years of experience
items.experience: Nika is an experienced instructor with international certification, specializing in teaching basic technique and improving carving skills. Her approach is based on patience and individual attention to each student. Helps overcome the fear of first descents and confidently master the slopes of Bakuriani.

items.name: Sandro
items.title: Freeride coach • 10+ years of experience
items.experience: Sandro is a professional freeride instructor with over ten years of experience. Trained in avalanche safety and off-piste skiing techniques. His passion is to show the beauty of untouched snow and teach safe skiing in the mountains. Works with both advanced riders and those just starting to explore freeride.

items.name: Mariam
items.title: Children's instructor • 6+ years of experience
items.experience: Mariam is a specialized instructor for working with children. Has special training in child psychology and teaching methods. Creates a safe and fun atmosphere in lessons where children not only learn to ski but also enjoy the process. Her lessons are structured, clear and adapted to each child's age.
